Sentencas: The cathode material La2-xBixCuO4 (x=0, 0.05, 0.10) for solid oxide fuel cell was synthesized by glycine-nitrate method.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The phase of the material was analyzed by X-ray diffraction (XRD) method.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The results show that the material crystallizes in peroskite -type single phase oxide.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: Due to the increase doping amount of bismuth, the space group of the material changes from Fmmm to I4/mmm.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The unit cell volume increases with the doping amount of bismuth.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: La2-xBixCuO4 cathode materials were found to show no chemical reaction with the electrolyte Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) at 950 t for 24 h, indicating the good chemical compatibility of La2-xBixCuO4 with SDC material.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The bismuth doping significantly increased the electrical conductivity of the material.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The highest conductivity reached 90.3 S.cm(-1) at 350 degrees C for La1.9Bi0.1CuO4.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The temperature programmed desorption (TPD) measurement proves that bismuth doping promotes the surface oxygen absorption ability of La2-xBixCuO4 material, and La1.9Bi0.1CuO4 shows the largest amount of oxygen vacancies among the Bi -doped materials.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties of La2-xBixCuO4 cathode materials were further studied by AC impedance spectroscopy under different oxygen partial pressures.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of La1.9Bi0.1CuO4 was 0.26 Omega.cm(2) at 700 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The peak power density (PPD) al 700 degrees C was 308 mW.cm(-2) for the SDC electrolyte supported single (tell NiO-SDC/SDC/La1.90Bi0.10CuO4.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material

Sentencas: The reaction rate limiting step is identified to be a mixed step involving the gas oxygen diffusion through the porous cathode and the surface adsorption process.
Titulo: Synthesis and Electrochemical Properties of La2-xBixCuO4 Cathode Material
